headline: Free Health Checkup Reached 500+ Villagers
summary: A successful camp in a rural area provided basic health services to over 500 participants in just two days.

headline: Diabetes Awareness Camp Saved Lives
summary: Early detection and awareness helped multiple people manage their health better after attending the camp.

headline: Mobile Eye Camp Performed 60+ Cataract Surgeries
summary: A joint initiative that restored sight to more than 60 patients for free.
